snippet: President Mahinda Rajapaksa promised for years to support greater political autonomy for the country’s Tamil ethnic minority in the wake of a bloody civil war.
abstract: Sri Lankan Pres Mahinda Rajapaksa appears to rule out greater political autonomy for country's Tamil ethnic minority, despite promising for years to support idea in wake of bloody civil war.
lead_paragraph: President Mahinda Rajapaksa promised for years to support greater political autonomy for the country’s Tamil ethnic minority in the wake of a bloody civil war.

headline.seo: Sri Lankan Leader Seems to Reject Greater Autonomy for Tamils
headline.main: Sri Lankan Leader Seems to Reject Greater Autonomy for Tamils
headline.print_headline: Sri Lankan Leader Seems to Reject Greater Autonomy for Tamils
